script.dialog: So you want to hear my story?|L||!|The Story of The Devil?
Well, I can't tell it to you yet.
You see, a lot of story pieces have been moved around before.
I don't want to tell you things if they are just going to be changed later.
The whole game is getting close though.|L||!|The stories will be added last.
I know I've said that for so long now, but look at me now!
Anyways, I don't have patience like you do.
I want to get in there and knock the fear outta those monsters already!
And you're gunna help me do that!|L||!|Right now!
